sections.heading: Transfer of powers and duties to the Board of Higher Education
sections.text: On July 1, 2010, all powers and duties of the State Board of Education under this Act were transferred to the Board of Higher Education.

sections.heading: Creation of Initiative. The Grow Your Own Teacher Education Initiative is created
sections.text: Grow Your Own Illinois shall administer the Initiative as a grant competition to fund consortia that will carry out Grow Your Own Teacher preparation programs.

sections.heading: Selection of grantees.
